statements: DELETE FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE participant_id = 101 AND course_end_date < '2022-10-31';
DELETE FROM wilderness_survival_course_participants WHERE survival_rating >= 90 AND course_end_date >= '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM participants WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM progress WHERE participant_id = 100 AND day = 10;
DELETE FROM achievements WHERE participant_id = 2 AND achievement_type = 'Runner' AND date_achieved = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Achievements WHERE participant_id = 2 AND skill_id = 3;
